body.name: HOTOR Travel Toiletry Bag for Women with Hanging Hook - Portable Cosmetic Case, Toiletry Bag for Traveling Women, Waterproof Travel Essentials, Pink

features: SPACIOUS YET COMPACT: HOTOR hanging toiletry bag features a compact size of 11 x 7.75 x 3.35 inches while having a size of 31.5 x 11 inches when opened. It can help to keep your large travel accessories like shampoo, lotions, face wash, toothpaste, toothbrushes, hair brush, and daily makeup well-organized. Medium size is suitable for overnight or short trips.

MULTIPLE STORAGE COMPARTMENTS: This travel toiletry bag for women have four main compartments with zippers. Together with the considerate design of transparent pockets, you can easily grab exactly what you need without completely opening the bags. Moreover, these leakproof transparent pockets can separate wet items from dry ones, allowing you to store your daily stuff, from vitamins to your makeup products, even electronic devices, or charging cables.

STURDY HOOK DESIGN: The 360° swivel metal hook allows hanging the cosmetic travel bag from a towel rack, coat hook, or wherever is available, making your toiletries and cosmetics displayed well for easy access and saving bathroom counter space as well. In addition, the sturdy metal hook features a retractable design, which means it can be put away when not in use.

USER-FRIENDLY DESIGNS: With supporting pads, HOTOR travel bag for toiletries can keep the full shape of the bag and provides excellent protection for items inside; The elastic straps keep your toiletries bottle upright and prevent the liquid from escaping; Reinforced zippers are used to ensure durability and smooth opening.

WATERPROOF & MULTIPURPOSE: This hanging toiletry bag for women features leakproof and waterproof transparent pockets that can be used in the bathroom. It is compact, sturdy, portable, and lightweight so it's ideal for business trips, travel, gym, camping, home use, and more. Just take this travel must-have anywhere with the portable and convenient grab handle.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #3,147 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #9 in Toiletry Bags

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best toiletry bag ever!
reviews.reviewText: I agree with the positive reviews already posted. I love the fabric this is made from, the plentiful, well-designed storage space, yet compact size, the quality of the zippers and other material as well as workmanship, and the attractive choice of color. In all my travel years (plenty), this is the BEST toiletry bag I ever have purchased and I’ve had plenty of experience searching. I like it so much, I ordered a second just to keep in storage because, if I ever have to replace this one, I want to be sure the same product is available.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love the material. It's excellent quality and looks like it cost twice as much. It fits all of my makeup and brushes and smaller bottles of hair products, deodorant, etc.If you travel with large bottles of the product I would not recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Size is perfect
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for traveling, fits many cosmetics. The color is beautiful and its a decent size cosmetic bag! Definitely worth my money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Holds quite a bit and folds up nicely
reviews.reviewText: Ordered this exclusively for travel. It seemed to hold quite a bit, I had one pocket for make up, one for my 3 ounces of liquids, one for medication and another for miscellaneous. Even though I had it stuffed quite full it did fold up nicely and fit well in my backpack. Only reason I did not give it a five is because of the flimsy hook, it seems like it will probably break pretty easily at some point. The outside looks very nice and the pink color is not too bright.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great compartments and space

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Traveler's Dream Toiletry Bag - You Need This!
reviews.reviewText: Hey fellow travelers,I just got to spill the beans about this toiletry bag that I recently snagged for my travels. You know how we are always in search of that one bag that can hold all our stuff without being a monster to carry around? Well, I think this might just be the one.First off, the material it's made from is just top-notch; it feels durable yet soft to the touch, promising to last through many adventures. I can already tell it's going to be my travel buddy for a long time.And let's talk about space because this bag is slender yet can fit a surprising amount of stuff; it’s like the Mary Poppins of toiletry bags! I managed to fit all my travel essentials in there without any fuss.Now onto my favorite part - the rotatable hanging hook! It's such a lifesaver in hotel rooms where counter space is basically non-existent. I could just hang it in the closet, and voila, everything is in sight and easy to reach, making the whole getting ready process a breeze.And of course, who can ignore the waterproof feature? Because let's face it, spills happen, and this bag just shrugs it off, keeping everything inside safe and dry.All in all, I am absolutely loving this toiletry bag. It truly stands as a champion for both men and women with its spacious yet slim design, providing a hassle-free experience while jet-setting. Do yourself a favor and get this travel essential - your future self will thank you!Safe travels and happy packing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice size and many compartments
reviews.reviewText: Excellent for travel. It is a little fat when filling it up but holds alot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was so excited for this package! The size is perfect for my travel items and I’m leaving for a trip next week. Upon opening the bag I saw that it was covered in dirt and mold spores. (I can confirm these are mold spores because this happened to an old pair of shoes of mine a few years ago). Really disappointed, I will be returning :(
